about_the_game:
Surviving in a fantasy world


This fantasy world has several areas with vastly different styles, each filled with elemental fairies full of curiosity towards intruders. You need to pay attention and be careful when dealing with them. Otherwise, although they do not have strong hostility towards you, the powerful magic they inadvertently release may instantly erase you from this world.
When you survive from the magic of the elemental fairies, don't take it lightly. Next, you will encounter the masters of this area, who are more powerful and intelligent than the elemental fairies. Their magnificent magic will cover every corner you can see, making even a move a luxury.
Each lord's abilities are carefully designed, and they are powerful but not invincible. You can choose to repel them with a frontal attack, or you can choose to keep running until they have nothing to do with you. In fact, you may find that sometimes running away is not as easy as facing battles directly, and even becomes increasingly difficult.

Strengthen your abilities


When enemies retreat, they will randomly discard items, and when you approach them, you will automatically pick them up. As your exploration deepens, you will receive more and more dropped objects, which will enhance your abilities, such as stronger attacks, shorter attack intervals, more flying objects, and a larger range of item pickup.

Unlock new items


You can unlock new weapons or items by entering and challenging a special world. They have different game mechanics and enhancement routes, and bringing them with you can bring you a completely different gaming experience.

Operation method


  • W. S, A, D move forward, backward, left, and right
  • Space,move up
  • Shift,move down
  • Left mouse button, start/stop shooting
  • Esc, call out menu
detailed_description:
Surviving in a fantasy world


This fantasy world has several areas with vastly different styles, each filled with elemental fairies full of curiosity towards intruders. You need to pay attention and be careful when dealing with them. Otherwise, although they do not have strong hostility towards you, the powerful magic they inadvertently release may instantly erase you from this world.
When you survive from the magic of the elemental fairies, don't take it lightly. Next, you will encounter the masters of this area, who are more powerful and intelligent than the elemental fairies. Their magnificent magic will cover every corner you can see, making even a move a luxury.
Each lord's abilities are carefully designed, and they are powerful but not invincible. You can choose to repel them with a frontal attack, or you can choose to keep running until they have nothing to do with you. In fact, you may find that sometimes running away is not as easy as facing battles directly, and even becomes increasingly difficult.

Strengthen your abilities


When enemies retreat, they will randomly discard items, and when you approach them, you will automatically pick them up. As your exploration deepens, you will receive more and more dropped objects, which will enhance your abilities, such as stronger attacks, shorter attack intervals, more flying objects, and a larger range of item pickup.

You can unlock new weapons or items by entering and challenging a special world. They have different game mechanics and enhancement routes, and bringing them with you can bring you a completely different gaming experience.

  • Shift,move down
  • Left mouse button, start/stop shooting
  • Esc, call out menu
name: Blossom

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: 1.66 GHz Intel i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4600
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060

short_description: Flying in a fantasy world, shooting and avoiding the magnificent magic casted by fairies.
